response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and is tailored to meet your needs exceptionally well. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it would bring to you, I propose a price of $950,000 for this remarkable item. This offer reflects my confidence in the product's value to you and my commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates its true worth. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
